title.rendered: JUNIOR’S RESTAURANT AND BAKERY OPENS FIRST WEST COAST LOCATION AT LAS VEGAS RESORTS WORLD

content.rendered:
A “Slice of Brooklyn” Hits the Strip at Resorts World Las Vegas

LAS VEGAS, Feb. 29, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — In an exciting blend of East Coast tradition and Las Vegas flair, Junior’s Restaurant and Bakery, famed for its cheesecakes and classic diner delights, held its official grand opening at Resorts World Las Vegas (RWLV) on Wednesday, February 28, 2024. Drawn by RWLV’s vibrant atmosphere and bustling tourism, Junior’s chose the property to host its first-ever west-coast location since the food chain’s inception. The partnership is expected to attract locals and visitors alike who are eager to embrace Brooklyn culture straight from the Las Vegas strip.


Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/juniors-restaurant-and-bakery-opens-first-west-coast-location-at-las-vegas-resorts-world-302076189.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
